name: Simetrik
headline: No code enterprise SaaS for financial control automation.
description: No code enterprise SaaS for financial control automation. Empowering finops and accounting teams with a no code platform that allows them to automate and maintain financial control automation throughout the finops process.
generated_description:
**Simetrik: Simplifying Financial Control Automation**

Simetrik is a Colombian fintech startup that was founded in 2018 and is part of the Y Combinator W18 batch. Based in Bogotá, it has grown to a robust team of 350 employees, harnessing the power of a no-code enterprise SaaS platform specializing in financial control automation. Their mission is clear: to empower financial operations and accounting teams by automating processes, reducing operational burdens, and maintaining stringent financial controls at every stage of finance operations. 

**Why Simetrik?**

In today’s fast-paced financial landscape, accuracy and efficiency are critical. Simetrik brings a powerful solution that allows users to automate cumbersome reconciliation and accounting closure tasks. This not only boosts financial efficiency but also allows teams to focus on strategic decision-making instead of getting bogged down in manual processes.

With an impressive rollout of features that include customizable solutions tailored to unique business needs, real-time data dashboards, and AI-backed reporting tools, it's about making financial control simpler and smarter. Their Simetrik Assistant leverages advanced technology to refine operations and automate reporting tasks. Furthermore, with over 4,800 connection sources already integrated, they are positioned to serve a variety of industries, from payment service providers to e-commerce platforms.

**Proven Impact**

The platform stands out for its remarkable statistics — processing over 1 billion reconciled records daily and experiencing five-fold growth in reconciled records year-on-year. Many prestigious companies like Bancolombia, MercadoLibre, and Rappi rely on Simetrik to enhance their financial processes. Testimonials from clients highlight how the platform has transformed their operations by reducing fraud and errors, providing more accurate insights, and enhancing overall financial performance.

**Conclusion**

In essence, Simetrik is creating a shift in how financial teams operate, removing the burden of tedious administrative tasks. Their approach of combining no-code technology with robust automation capabilities not only simplifies financial control but also sets a new standard in the fintech landscape. For anyone looking to streamline their financial operations without the hassle of coding or extensive tech knowledge, Simetrik seems to be a compelling option. To explore their offerings, you can check out their [website](https://simetrik.com) or request a demo to see it in action.
